Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Gen AI is more accessible than my teacher so I was able to learn concepts faster. However teacher responses are generally more reliable. I always need to fact check the responses that Gen AI generates.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Less of a hassle to use Gen AI instead of waiting on teacher response.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Gen AI responses can be made more succinct than teacher responses.
